ccb.text: 祝你平安！这里的朋友们都问候你，请代我一一问候你那边的朋友。

cnv.text: 願你平安。這裡的朋友都問候你。請你一一提名問候你那裡的朋友。

cunp.text: 願你平安。眾位朋友都問你安。請你替我按着姓名問眾位朋友安。

nasb.text: Peace be to you. The friends greet you. Greet the friends by name.

niv.text: Peace to you. The friends here send their greetings. Greet the friends there by name.

nlt.text: Peace be with you. Your friends here send you their greetings. Please give my personal greetings to each of our friends there.
